content:
# Map Making Quick Guide (Video Series)

A complete video tutorial series by **Dystopian Outcasts** covering everything you need to know to create custom maps for Project Zomboid. This 29-part series takes you from installing the tools to publishing your finished map on the Steam Workshop.

> **Playlist Link:** [Watch the full playlist on YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL9c7w_YTJlV_R0mgP-Rwb1i56SudS30XV)

---

## Overview

This series is designed for complete beginners. You'll learn:

- How to set up all the mapping tools (TileZed, WorldEd, GIMP)
- Creating base map images and vegetation
- Building structures with TileZed
- Integrating your map with vanilla Project Zomboid
- Adding spawn points, zones, and loot
- Publishing to Steam Workshop

**Total Videos:** 29  
**Difficulty:** Beginner-friendly  
**Tools Required:** TileZed, WorldEd, GIMP (free)

---

## Getting Started (Videos 1-2)

Set up your mapping environment and get the latest tools.

| # | Video | Description |
|---|-------|-------------|
| 1 | **Getting Map Tools** | Download and install the official PZ mapping tools |
| 2 | **Getting UPDATED PZ Tools!** | Get Tilezoned/After Tools and dev build for latest features |

---

## Creating Your Map (Videos 3-8)

Learn the fundamentals of map creation - from image files to your first rendered map.

| # | Video | Description |
|---|-------|-------------|
| 3 | **Creating a New Map (Using GIMP)** | Set up your map project in GIMP |
| 4 | **Creating a Base Map Image** | Design the foundation of your map |
| 5 | **Creating the Vegetation Image** | Add trees, grass, and natural elements |
| 6 | **Creating a File Structure for our Map** | Organize your mod files correctly |
| 7 | **Working with WorldEd and rendering your map** | First look at WorldEd and rendering |
| 8 | **Let's get Drawing** | Start placing tiles and building |

---

## Learning TileZed (Videos 9-12)

Master the TileZed editor - the core tool for building structures.

| # | Video | Description |
|---|-------|-------------|
| 9 | **Learning TileZed - PART 1** | TileZed basics and interface |
| 10 | **Learning about the Tiles Menu Tool - PART 2** | Understanding tile selection and placement |
| 11 | **Learning more Tiles Tools - PART 3** | Advanced tile tools and techniques |
| 12 | **Making Roofs - PART 4** | Creating proper roofs for buildings |

---

## Adding Map to Vanilla (Videos 13-16)

Integrate your custom map with the base game world.

| # | Video | Description |
|---|-------|-------------|
| 13 | **Adding Spawnpoints to the Map - PART 1** | Create player spawn locations |
| 14 | **Making a Cell - PART 2** | Understanding cells and map structure |
| 15 | **Creating Roads that Merge with Vanilla - PART 3** | Connect your roads to existing map |
| 16 | **Updating the Vegetation Map - PART 4** | Match vegetation with vanilla areas |

---

## Mapping Trouble & Workshop (Videos 17-20)

Troubleshooting common issues and publishing to Steam.

| # | Video | Description |
|---|-------|-------------|
| 17 | **Adding Files to Local Folder - PART 1** | Set up local testing files |
| 18 | **Attempting to Test locally - PART 2** | Test your map in-game |
| 19 | **Uploading Map to Steam Workshop - PART 3** | Start the Workshop upload process |
| 20 | **Completing the upload to Steam - PART 4** | Finalize your Workshop submission |

---

## Polish & Details (Videos 21-22)

Make your map look professional with finishing touches.

| # | Video | Description |
|---|-------|-------------|
| 21 | **Lining Up Our Roads with Vanilla** | Perfect road alignment techniques |
| 22 | **Adding Details to your Map** | Props, clutter, and environmental storytelling |

---

## Zoning Your Map (Videos 23-27)

Add gameplay systems - foraging, vehicles, zombies, stories, and loot.

| # | Video | Description |
|---|-------|-------------|
| 23 | **Adding Foraging and Loot Respawns - PART 1** | Set up foraging zones |
| 24 | **Adding Vehicle Zones - PART 2** | Define where vehicles spawn |
| 25 | **Adding Zombie Zones - PART 3** | Control zombie population density |
| 26 | **Adding Story Zones - PART 4** | Create narrative elements and scenarios |
| 27 | **Adding Loot Zones - PART 5** | Configure loot distribution |

---

## Testing & World Map (Videos 28-29)

Final testing and adding your map to the in-game world map.

| # | Video | Description |
|---|-------|-------------|
| 28 | **Testing Our Map** | Comprehensive testing walkthrough |
| 29 | **Adding your Map to the World Map** | Display your map on the in-game map |

---

## Quick Links

- [Full YouTube Playlist](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL9c7w_YTJlV_R0mgP-Rwb1i56SudS30XV)
- [Join Dystopian Outcasts Discord](https://discord.gg/KgNBWyfcvZ) - Get help from the community

---

## What's Next?

After completing this series, you'll have a fully functional custom map published to the Steam Workshop. For more advanced techniques, check out:

- The official [PZwiki Mapping Guide](https://pzwiki.net/wiki/Mapping)
- [The One Stop TileZed Mapping Shop](https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=853478035) on Steam
- The [Unofficial PZ Mapping Discord](https://discord.gg/pzmapping) for community support
